Activity: Arrive at the hospital, check emails. Start a bit of online shopping.
Attend the daily stand-up meeting to provide an update on the progress of the EHR workflow updates.
Address any outstanding issues or questions related to the updated workflows with @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2.

Meet with @his-1, @his-2, @da-1, @da-2 to discuss how the updated workflows will impact data collection and analysis for seasonal influenza trends. @PEOPLE: Impact of Updated Workflows on Data Collection
Work with @his-1, @his-2 to ensure that the necessary data elements are captured in the EHR system to support influenza trend analysis.
Coordinate with @trainer-1 to schedule training sessions for nurses and physicians on the updated workflows.
Prepare for the upcoming training sessions by reviewing the training materials and practicing the demonstrations.
Send out email reminders to all staff members regarding the upcoming training sessions.
Address any last-minute questions or concerns from staff members regarding the updated workflows or training sessions.
